entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

text:
@realDonaldTrump 5G Syndrome Maps Perfectly with Coronavirus Outbreaks
There’s hard evidence now emerging the further away we get from the original crime scene in Wuhan, China, and as the coronavirus pops up around the world in 5G Hotspots that indicates this pandemic is being manufactured,
